Articles.Content:
Jeb wanted easier access to the capsule, because getting in through the launchpad arm isn\'t kerbal.

When the world initializes, the boosters break off under their own weight. The intentionally very kerbal rocket itself launches normally.

This is hilariously useless

Could you try adding struts to it to keep it together? Seeing this fly could be interesting. Very inter-esting...

BTW: another orbinaut!
No number of struts are keeping this thing in one piece. Jebediah\'s Ladder mk2 just breaks the struts.
I fkin lol\'d at the struts xD
